ygData.subject: Re: Great Info
ygData.msgSnippet: umm, if you kill Crushbone orcs you will alienate Neriak and darkelves, having said that if you go to far you find yourself homeless since your homeland may
ygData.messageBody:
umm, if you kill Crushbone orcs you will alienate Neriak and darkelves,
having said that if you go to far you find yourself homeless since your
homeland may change from amiable to dubious which means no selling or
buying.

Killing Crushbone orcs ONLY increases faction with he guard types of the
elven lands if you get this faction to warmly then the vendors will start to
con dubious - still not good enough to bye, sell and train.

You have been warned.

> ----------
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bryan Hinkel [mailto:bjhinkel@...]
